long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI assistants like Claude work better when you give them detailed information, but typing all that out takes forever. That's why I built Yapping - it's a Chrome extension that lets you talk to Claude instead of typing. Just install it, put in your API key, and you'll see a button on Claude's interface. Click it and start talking.
